EmailTemplate.name: Reminder Email - Webinar
EmailTemplate.subject: Intapp Webinar: Login Information
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for registering for the "State of LegalKEY" webinar. It will start in 30 minutes, at 9:00am Pacific / 12:00pm Eastern / 5:00pm BST. Video and audio access instructions are below.
If you have any trouble logging into the webinar, please email Lea.Schweitzer@intapp.com for technical support.
Webinar Title: The State of LegalKEY: Responding to New Risks
Conference URL: https://intappinc.webex.com/intappinc/j.php?J=491629591
Audio:
US/Canada Toll-Free: (877) 817-7103 UK Toll-Free: 0 800 032 3836 International Toll: (813) 337-6188 Conference Code: 54194714
Please note that you must dial-in to one of the above numbers to connect to the audio. Audio is not available through the WebEx client.
Please log in and dial the conference audio line 5-10 minutes prior to the start time.
